songs.title: Money Make Her Smile (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Instrumental break]

[Verse 1]
All you 'get back, coming to the stage'
Is a girl who's new in town
She go by the name 'Where Your Stacks At?'
This pretty little thing, I swear, won't let you down
Watch her drop it like, (dat..) hey!

Pre Chorus (Inno Thakid)
Then she picked it up and pop it, everybody want's it
Facial, legendary. Body is iconic
No way that you can stop it, she's way too versatile
The music makes her dance, but the money makes her smile

[Chorus]
Oh, it's not complicated, so this won't take a while
You see, music make her dance
And money, money, money make her smile
(Give her what you got, give her, give her what you got...)
Money, money, money make her smile
(Give her what you got, give her, give her what you got...)
Money, money, money make her smile

[Verse 2]
She's a super freak
You wouldn't know it if you saw her outside these velvet walls
No, she don't go where preachers preach
She only go to the church where dollars fall
Watch her drop it like, (dat..) hey!

Pre Chorus (Inno Thakid)
Then she picked it up and pop it, everybody want's it
Facial, legendary. Body is iconic
No way that you can stop it, she's way too versatile
The music makes her dance, but the money makes her smile

[Chorus]
Oh, it's not complicated, so this won't take a while
You see, music make her dance
And money, money, money make her smile
(Give her what you got, give her, give her what you got...)
Money, money, money make her smile
(Give her what you got, give her, give her what you got...)
Money, money, money make her smile

[Bridge]
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Watch her....
Give her what you got, give her, give her what you got...

(Inno Thakid)
As soon as I walked up in, I need some oxygen
First thing I noticed is shorty's been doing squats again
So bring them boxes in, let them know wer're some bosses
We're tossing them dollars often, no tithing, it's just the offering
She don't be hot for them, don't even want to talk to them
They pull up in the parking lot, she spots them by their moccasins
She's on the clock again, her work ethic is wild
The music gets her to dance, but the money makes her smile

[Chorus]
Oh, it's not complicated, so this won't take a while
You see, music make her dance
And money, money, money make her smile
(Give her what you got, give her, give her what you got...)
Money, money, money make her smile
(Give her what you got, give her, give her what you got...)
Money, money, money make her smile
